categories: Category:Battles of the Yuuzhan Vong War

nodes.text: The Battle of Mantessa was fought during the Yuuzhan Vong War.
A Yuuzhan Vong force, including Fire Breathers, tried to invade the planet Mantessa but was defeated by the Orange Panthacs—a platoon of B2 super battle droids.
Later, the Orange Panthacs received a special commendation from Chief of State Cal Omas for their defense of the planet.
